H0.text: Closed circuit is the name of a circuit in which the current splits at the junctions.

H1.text: Parallel circuit is the name of a circuit in which the current splits at the junctions.

H2.text: Series circuit is the name of a circuit in which the current splits at the junctions.

H3.text: Short circuit is the name of a circuit in which the current splits at the junctions.

A4.text: The total current is the sum of the currents through the individual components, in accordance with Kirchhoff's current law.

A5.text: In a series circuit, the current that flows through each of the components is the same.
